alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 7:17AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Shelby and southern Jefferson Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 717 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tannehill Ironworks State Park, or near Bessemer, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Birmingham, Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Alabaster, Bessemer, Homewood, Pelham, Mountain Brook, Helena, Hueytown, Gardendale, Irondale, Fairfield, Chelsea, Fultondale, Pleasant Grove, Tarrant, Midfield, Brighton and Indian Springs Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
